text: Panasonic Corporation, formerly known as Matsushita Electric Industrial Co., Ltd, is a multinational electronics company. Panasonic is known for their electronics products. The company was created by K≈çnosuke Matsushita in 1918. It is the fourth-largest television manufacturer in the world. The company was known, as Matsushita Electric Industrial Co., Ltd. from 1935 to October 1, 2008. == Products == Panasonic has a products such as televisions, mobile phones, laptops, air conditioners, washing machine, refrigerator, cameras, video game systems, lightning, projectors and bicycles. ==References== ==Other websites== *Panasonic Global website Category:1918 establishments Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange Category:Companies listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange Category:Electronics companies of Japan Category:Technology companies of Japan Category:Multinational technology companies Category:Telephone companies Category:1910s establishments in Japan
title: Panasonic
